assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: GC-P contributed to this study while employed at The University of Queensland. He is now an employee of 23andMe Inc., and he may hold stock or stock options. All other authors declare having no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the Human Research Ethics Committee of the QIMR Berghofer Medical Research Institute.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All participants provided informed consent for the publication of study results.
